text: Cuidado Con Las Mujeres (English language:With the Music in my Soul) is a 1951 Argentine comedy film directed by Enrique Cahen Salaberry and screen written by Ariel Cortazzo based on a play by André Revesz. The film starred Otto Sirgo. ==Cast== thumb *Alberto Closas *Analía Gadé *Nelly Meden *Otto Sirgo *Héctor Calcaño *Julián Bourges *Miguel Ligero *José Comellas *Mario Baroffio *Ángel Eleta *María Esther Podestá *Amalia Bernabé *Pedro Pompillo *Max Citelli *Nelly Lainez ==External links== * Category:Argentine films Category:1951 films Category:Spanish-language films Bolidos Category:1951 comedy films
title: Cuidado Con Las Mujeres
